title: trying to reconnect
body: so when i login into my account, i can see the main page with the open chat. but the screen gets blocked with a trying to reconnect block, which cant be removed unless i press the exit button. everything was fine 24h earlier

replies.body: It looks like you were having this issue around the same time as the patcher loop issue we were experiencing early today, but those problems should be smoothed out at this point. Let me know if you still can't get logged in to play!
would be nice if we get another reply, otherwise this is pointless here.

From the looks of our [**status page **](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw), it does look like we're still having some login issues here and there. This could be what you're having troubles with, but if you're able to connect and keep seeing a reconnect message then it's more likely that your network is having problems keeping it's connection with our servers. Run through the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and if that doesn't help hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I have the same problem. And yes, you are right, I also had this issue at the time the problem with patcher loop was evident. However, after it got "fixed" I managed to log in, and it actually was fully functional - I was able to play. Nevertheless, I logged out some 14 hrs ago, hoping this is a thing of the past, but I was wrong. 
Still can't play. Technically I can log in, but the client is not functional, as the only thing I can do is close it.
the client was working at some point yesterday. now the same problem occures again
